Installer.Name: FairBudget
Installer.Description: Old generation of the Fairmas financial planning product suite (VB6).

Installer.Name: FairMapping
Installer.Description: Tool for FairBudget/FairPlanner (old generation) the imports actual data from account systems.

Installer.Name: FairPayroll (MassiveRefac)
Installer.Description: The Fairmas manning guide planning tool (improved version).

Installer.Name: FairPayroll
Installer.Description: The Fairmas manning guide planning tool.

Installer.Name: FairTask
Installer.Description: The Fairmas tool for scheduling tasks and workflows to provide automatic interfaces between the Fairmas systems and 3rd party tools.

Installer.Name: [IPlan] CapexPlanner
Installer.Description: The IHG financial planning tool for capital expenditures. Part of the IPlan product suite.

Installer.Name: [IPlan] EFPM 5 Fiscal
Installer.Description: The IHG Extended Forecast Planning Module (EFPM) for financial budget and forecast process planning (fiscal edition). Part of the IPlan product suite.

Installer.Name: [IPlan] EFPM 5
Installer.Description: The IHG Extended Forecast Planning Module (EFPM) for financial budget and forecast process planning. Part of the IPlan product suite.
